values:
Yeah so it's been a while since i've last updated.... I almost updated when i was in school in Australia, but the teacher kinda kicked us off the compy's. Oh well.
Hmm... Soo much has happened too much to tell all in fact. 
I went to Australia and New Zealand, and it was amazing. I'd go back in a heartbeat! I met some amazing people who i LOVE to death. And i saw and did some amazing things. the only word that can sum up my trip is A-MAZE-ZING and for those of you that didn't get it...AMAZING!!

But it feels good to be back, even though i cried a lot that i had to leave everyone I still <3 my home. I was soo excited that my two favorite people were there at the airport for me...Courtney and Amanda!

My grandma's in town so i've been spending more time at home. But I got to go to see my dear Nick today! 
Tomorrow I'm going to see Nicki!! I'm excited! 

Alright dears... I'm going to bed now, so Sweet Dreams. 
Much Love <3

xox  xox
  Kate
xox  xox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/24905.html

hmm....today i went to my eye appt. and then i went to maurices and got a lot of clothes. Then we went to the galleria and i had my last meeting for my trip to australia. After that amanda and i went to will's house to hang out with him and woody. Then we went for the quickest rez trip ever.....swear to god we were there and back in 10 minutes. Then we went and saw my aunt lisa and uncle regan and cousin geoff. I missed them......they live in  texas and i haven't seen them in forever. Then we went back to will's house and hung out.  frankie stopped over for a min. then after woody's "fake drunk fit" we went home and here i am. 
Until another entry........

much love
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/24702.html

omg.......i haven't updated in about 2 months......i miss lj......i've been hanging out with amanda woody and courtney a lot lately....what else is new though.

I got amoxicillin today.......yes best medicine ever!

I just did something that i know i wanted to do, but i'm not sure if i should have. Don't worry it's nothing bad like sex or drugs. 

Anyways i'm about to go watch empire records with amanda..... 

much love

xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/24332.html

I haven't posted in soo long.ohno..not really much to say though...
Beatrix died!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! RIP BEATRIX <33333 Don't worry kids she'll be back on the road in no time! i think it's her starter. I drove my mom's van today and it felt weird. But its better than being mobile-less. 

I miss things.........I don't know what but i know i miss them. 

Much Love
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/24169.html

Hmm.......I was back on the road by thursday, which was a surprise, kinda.

Friday I had to work and then i went over to woody's and hung out with him and amanda. Then I took my car home and woody took us back to his house. Then we went and played taxi for some kids and took the car back to woody's house. We walked to brian's and hung out for a while. Nothing too memorable. Then we took a cab to amanda's and I threw up out of nowhere. I wasn't even drinking or anything, and i don't think i am sick, it was just random. Oh well. Then we watched texas chainsaw but i feel asleep after like 20 mins and they didn't go to bed for another 2 hours lol.

Saturday I had to work and then after work i went to amanda's. Woody ran from us so we spent the night trying to find him. We went to Celia's house for a while. I feel bad for Crystal....this girl's a stupid hoebag and punched her b/c she thought Crystal was talking about her but she wasn't or something. Oh well. Then i had to pick up my sister and this chick who i don't know, but i do know that i hate her. No not hate, despise. She's scummy. Then i got chinese food with alex and trevor and amanda. It was super amazing. That's right super amazing. Then i came home and woody called me and we made plans to go to amanda's really early in the morning (11)

This brings us to Today..... I picked woody up and we went to amanda's. (Keep in mind she's not aware of us coming over) We called like 40 times and then knocked on the door for 5 mins. Then we had the idea to throw pine cones at her window. how romantic. She woke up terrified wondering what the hell was going on. Then we hung out for a while and  I went to work. After work i went to woody's house and then to my house. After we went to Amanda's house and then got nick and came to my house for some quality trampoline time. I cherish those moments lol. Then i took them all home and here i am. i think i'm going to get going and read a little. Adios.
Much Love
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/23953.html

So last weekend was alright. Friday was really good. I saw my dearest katelyn for the first time in like 2 weeks!!! <33333 It was my mom's b-day so we had dinner and ate cake. then later... We went to trevor's house and had a bonfire. saturday was alright not as fun though. I hung out with amanda and nick and steve and dave for a while. Saw katelyn the <3 of my life! I came home at like 12 15 and dave and phil and katelyn <3 were there with my sister. So i hung out with those kids and i drove phil home at like 2 am. Sunday was mommy's day. We went to a park with a lighthouse and went out for ice cream. then we came home and i went to my grandma's for a while. then i had to come home and i went to nick's for a while becuase he was upset, but it's okay now! 
I'm grounded from my car b/c of an incident that happened yesterday. And i've been thinking how i'm not proud of how i act to my family lately. I got my car taken away because of it. and i really want to change, ot because of the car, because i don't like it. I want to be happy and nice to everyone.
Oh well....that's about it....<3
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/23580.html

i haven't updated in a while...so much to tell...

Last weekend was the greatest! Friday- i took my sister and crystal to sam and trevor's and then i went to woody's with brian amanda and zach. Singing and dancing in the kitchen was beautiful. Then i left at about 12. 

I had to work on saturday but after i got amanda and crystal. Then i dropped crystal off at sam and trevor's. We went to woody's dad's and then to tom pharrel's house. That was really fun. Then we went to Sam and trevor's and we had to sneak around their mom because she didn't want people over. Then levi and joe showed up. Max and woody were ready to bust caps. Max-i don't think you read lj, but if you do this is for you- thanks for being willing to kick ass for me, i just didn't want you to get in trouble. thanks! Then woody "played cool" with playskool. haha Then brian and woody and amanda stayed the night and my dad fixed his finger with a tampon wrapper. He's so crafty  lol. 
sunday-i got my nails done with amanda from work. Then we went to work. After work i hung out with nick for a lil while and then came home.

Today- I hung out with amanda, woody, brian and nick for a while,then i went to nick's house and hung out. I worked out on the gazelle for a while.

Alright that's about it. can't wait for my next adventure. <3
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/23394.html

I had the most boring weekend. Oh well. I bought a puppy. She's adorable. Her name is Riley. She's a Schnoodle, half schnauser, half poodle. Because today's her 1st day here, tomorrow i am allowed to skip, I'm excited! 

I'm grounded from driving because on friday i took the car out past nine without asking and it died in the nice and easy parking lot. Oh well. But, my mom wants me to take her to work so i have the car to "run errands" for her. I <3 her. Hope i get to see amanda and woody and brian after school. 

I am going to get going...Call me if you're not at school tomorrow! <3
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/23185.html

Oh man i had like the funnest weekend ever! It starts with a Friday night.....
Friday- went to trevors house with nick amanda and brian.....brian left after a lil while...we stayed i only drank a lil because i had to drive. Nick was so funny hah. then he and crystal and kaitlyn (<3) stayed the night. Nick called brad and he called back and was yelling so my sister was fighting with him lol.

Saturday- I went to work and after i got the perfect 50's dress for julie's wedding. then i came home and i went to trevor's again. It was fun, calmer than the night before! Then kaitlyn and crystal sayed the night again.

Sunday- I went to work again and then i stopped by courtney's to say hi. Then i went home and i went to woody's to  give amanda her books and ended up staying for a while. Oh and apparently you can go to Rite Aid and get dvd's before they came out. I dunno how that works, but brian showed me that he had meet the fockers and i guess it's supposed to come out on Tuesday. Then i came home and baked bread and watched Don't Say A Word.....one of my fav. movies! Now i'm going to go to bed. Much love! 
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/22996.html

hmm...oh yeah today i completely tore off the sideview mirror.....brian and amanda were laughing for like 2 hourse about that. oh well i'm not in trouble, thank god.! Then we went to the rez and on the way home, we stopped at lacy's house. I miss her so much!! I think this weekend we are going to have a "girl's day" b/c i miss her and woody has got mono so amanda cant hang out with him. (sorry hun) Oh well......i'm bored....and tired........Much Love babes!

xoxkatexox

http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/22320.html

Today i went to the nature trails with sofie and courteny......then we went to olcott beach. That place is NASTY!!!!! lol Then we went and got amanda and brian and woody and we got nick and played on the wooden playgroud....i was playing like a lil kid today lol.
I'm so tired.....school tomorrow....much love
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/22142.html

So today.. I went to my meeting for Australia. That went well i guess, i was frickin freezing though. Then i went to the SPCA with my mom and dad. I was so excited. I have three dogs on my mind, we put two on hold so that Sofie can meet them. On dog that we didn't put on hold but we walked her around was beautiful. Her name was Reese, she was a pit bull mix. But she was soo sweet and her markings made her look like a tiger almost. The other two dogs were 6 month old border collie mixes. they are brother and sister and so cute and calm. They are a lil shy though, but that might be because they had just gotten off of the truck from being transfered from W. Virginia. I don't want to get one without the other though, because they are so close to each other. My mom has names picked out for them but they aren't official...George and Gracie. I liked gracie but i don't know about george lol. Well i'm about to figure out what courtney is up to.....hopefully drive in tonight...call me..870-0906!
Much Love
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/21799.html

What to say...I'd like to thank steve for getting the door stuck on my car. But because i am a-maze-ing i got it unstuck, stuck again, and then finally unstuck for good. Then i went shopping...didn't get anything so it wasn't fun. But i tried on dresses and i found a perfect Marilyn Monroe dress.....it's bee-you-ti-ful! ( sorry for writing these words all retarded-like! )

I am so tired...I am going to crash any second now. 

Weekend plans....got any....i'll probably do the same old stuff, hang out with courtney (x2?) and amanda. I want to go to the drive in on saturday...Oh well......call the cell...8700906........<3
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/21745.html

Hmm....not much is new to report.....Courtney's staying in lockport! Whooo! I didn't really know her before but now that i do i'm glad......she's crazy cool lol.
I quit lacrosse because my job interferes w/ it and i need to fundraise for Australia......

Today we went to the Hong Kong Buffet......i <3 chinese!

About a week a go i told the moms i smoke......she was cool about it and wanted me to quit.......no comes the hard part.....quitting.

I got into an accident on sunday.....oops......it was really bad weather out in my defense! Oh well.

I'm bored.....gotta find something to do....call me
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/21405.html

Oh man. Today i woke up and went to Dick's to sell raffle tickets for lacrosse. I took frankie and woody with me, they took my car and went to timmy ho's and forgot my freakin cappucino!! WTF! Oh well. I'm waiting for amanda to get done w/ her hair....then i'm going to give her a call. I want to have fun tonight, maybe drink a lil.

Yesterday we hung out and played games like scrabble and charades at tom's house. haha that was funny. Then we went to the Hong Kong Buffet! Woo. I love that place. 
 
Now i am bored......i'm going to figure out what the night will bring. <3
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/21126.html

Oh man... i started my day with my car running out of gas, so i had to walk to my mom's work to get help. I only wonder what the rest of the day will bring. I have lacrosse today,and i actually have my stick this time. 

Later i don't know what's going on but i hope it's good.

I'm excited for my field trip to the zoo with amanda , courtney and i think nick. I haven't been there in soo long!

Yesterday we had a game night! I am the best at speed! Only lost one time out of like a hundred. Good job amanda you beat me! I let amanda and courtney drive around the block yesterday. I was all ready to let amanda drive until she said "i've never driven on a real road" then i got scared lol... But they both did very well!

And i'm sorry i didn't know i wasn't allowed to get my stuff. Every other time you say come on in. Oh well.

I'm off to shower....call me if you desire.
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/20758.html

I am so bored now! But sooo glad for spring break, despite the fact that it's effin snowing out!

I spent tonight watching shark attack with my mom and pulling woody's leg hairs with amanda...haha. Fun!

Tomorrow i think ppl are coming over! Whooo!

xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/20697.html

Oh man. So last night kristi and i drove around and then went to will's house Then they all came to my house. They were drinking, i wasn't. My sister scared us by pulling in. We thought it was my mommy and daddy. Then mandy wrestled will. That was funny. No one really won because they hit their heads so hard. I guess a rematch will be necessary. Mandy tried to wrestle mike but he wouldn't. That would have been interesting. Then woody decided to find as much change in my house as possible. I think he left with like 5 dollars in change in his pockets. I made pizza pockets! I love them! Then i made frankie one too. Will was trying to make out with kristi she was hesitant, but we all know she wanted to. lol....Then they left and kristi and I watched the weirdest movie ever...The Forgotten. AHH. Sleep came next.
Today..kristi and i woke up at 8:40...i dropped off kristi and went to frankie's house. Frankie refused to come with, so woody and i headed to B-lo to get my dear amanda! My car kept making weird movements, it's like it had hydrolics, but it doesn't. Then when i was getting off the thruway the wheel stopped turning and the brakes didn't work. Then the car stalled. I restarted it and all was well. We got mildly lost. But we found amanda!! Then i dropped them off and here i am. I think i'm going to take a shower and go to work. Much love!

xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/20306.html

I just got home a little while ago. Amanda spent the night last night and it was fun, we stayed up and looked at the yearbook from last year. Oh man, yearbook pics are THE WORST! I'm really glad we've gotten to be such good friends! You're a doll. Then this morning we went to the doctors office and saw Frankie there! I got a red Safe-T-Pop! Those are my fav! Then we went to woody's house and watched cartoons. Then we had a shower fest. And by that i don't mean we all showered together! Apparently my shower doesn't have enough room to move around in'. Then we picekd up frankie and came back home. We had a straight up FIGHT CLUB in my living room. Woody and Frankie both fought my sister in wrestling. And may i say, they got their asses kicked by a little 14 yr old girl. Although i might add my sister's a beast. Then we went to KFC and big surprise they are out of chicken. HOW THE HELL DO YOU FUN OUT OF CHICKEN AT KENTUCKY FRIED CHICKEN!!?? Oh well. Then Amanda had to go to B-Lo, so frankie, woody and i got lacy and went to the blvd. mall! I got a cute shirt and shoes!! :) 
Omg..i almost forgot...when i was pulling out of tom's driveway there was suddenly this guy behind my car and i freaked out and drove away......he showed up out of nowhere and then starting running after i pulled away?? It was creepy. Then he told me some story about a ghost, but i think he was making that up lol.

okay, here's where i start to have problems, I didn't realize we had a problem, but apparently you did. You can tell me, not my mom or lj. I tried to call over and over, i guess it's my fault when you don't answer the phone?!?    
Oh well call me and we can talk about it i guess? 

As for now i'm sitting here.....I might go to bed. I don't know. Sleep is needed. 
Tomorrow......work...later..lacrosse....later???

Mucho Amor
xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/20179.html

**Since I've been told to cut the shit with the colors, i am making a nice boring entry. I hope you are happy.**

I love lacrosse. It's so fun. My legs are killing me, but i love it. I'm actually getting kinda good at it too, which is cool. I'm really happy with my life right now. I love my friends, all 5 wheels (sorry courtney!!) I just am very happy with the way things have been going for me. And i know you are going to make fun of me for this if you read it, but I'm happy with how things with Frankie have been going! I'm just happy. 

Now that i'm done being a dyke.....I finally get to have a real weekend. I only work for like 2 hours both saturday and sunday....serious cut in the paycheck, but it is still great to finally have time to do something during the day on the weekend. It will be the first time this has happened since october!!!! I hope i have fun. 

I really really want to go see Jimmy Eat World, they are my favorite band ever, and their music has helped me out a lot with so many of my problems. As stupid as that sounds, it's true, they are amazing.

Alright that's all i have to say... Much love!
xoxKatexox

Now that just feels weird, a completely colorless post. Oh well, change is good.
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/19807.html

Friday was funny. Before work we all went to the salvation army. That was funny. After work kristi and i picked up amanda and courtney, then we went to will's moms house and hung out with frankie and woody. They were all oh so intoxicated, which made it twice as funny for us.  I never knew i had this many gay friends. lol....

Today I went to work, and i worked all day. Then I picked up kristi and we picked up frankie. We drove around for about an hour, but then frankie had to go :(   Then i went home and got in trouble for talking back or something, so i couldn't go bowling, now I am stuck with nothing to do, and i'm miserable. I hate being home bored especially on a saturday night.

I  got to talk to Lacy though. Which was good. I really miss her. We kinda lost each other a little bit lately. But we are trying to hang out more. Which is beautiful.

Tomorrow i have to work at 10:30 until 6. Hopefully i can hang out with frankie after.
I'm going to get going, maybe i'll call someone. Much love.
xoxKatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/19567.html

Hmm....Friday night.....was fun...me kristi woody and frankie watched the grudge at frankie's house... Then we went to get some food and they got beer. Then we parked in the parking lot....they drank them. I did other stuff. :)  It was a pretty good night!

Saturday..Kristi and i had work...yes i got kristi a job..We went to jake's house....everyone else got to drink, but not katie becuase i was driving. I drank a lil bit, but not enough for it to be fun. Then me and frankie went to his house and hung out for a while. My car wouldn't start so we sat in the car for about 2 hours. Then my dad came and jumped it. Then i got home at like 1. But i am not complaining, Saturday was another good night.

Sunday...Went to work...Then i came home to discover that my dog shadow died. I don't really know how to deal with it, so i try not to think about it or i listen to Jimmy eat world "hear you me" that makes me feel better.. The We went to the brewhaus with kristi, frankie, woody, courtney, amanda, lisa, nick, and honour.  I think that was all of the ppl. Then after we went to frankies and watched Ferris Bueller's day off. That was about it that night...it was an okay night

Monday........HAPPY BIRTHDAY COURTNEY!!!!!!! I picked kristi up for breakfast this morning....We missed the breakfast menu by 5 minutes.WTF??? they can't jsut throw me a hashbrown, i don't care if it's slightly cool. I want my damn hashbrown!! Then i went to work. Then i went to frankie's house after work. Now i'm home and really bored.
later bitches...... Much Love
xoxKatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/19252.html

Hmm.. I got my license! I haven't killed myself yet so it's all good! Kristi and I are at the Brewhaus right now and i am drinking the very best drink ever.. Better Than Sex (sometimes) i love it to death. I suggest that you all go and buy one.

This Friday kristi and i are going to a purse party. I love those things! So many purses, so cheap. I want to buy some new Chanel earrings because i lost mine during "snark the shark" at Ska is Dead.

Not much to write. Goodbye dears.

Much love

xoxkatexox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/19152.html

Today...I did some practice driving, because tomorrow is my road test. I am so scared. Wish me tons of luck please! I am so nervous. But (not to sound cocky) I think i've seriously improved, and I am confident about my driving ability. I am excited.

Valentine's Day is coming. I'm not sure how I feel about this. I have never had someone special on Valentine's Day, that i jsut wanted to spend the Day with and be thankful for them. I really want that. But I am beginning to think that might not be as easy as I thought. I want a guy that loves me for me, and that is nice to me. I thought i had one of those, but what do I know about those things. Oh well. Amanda came up with a beautiful plan, we are going to exchange candy hearts with each other and Courtney, that way we all can get the colors we want! That makes me happy.

I'm really glad that I've reconciled with Amanda, and we are friends. She's an amazing girl. ...keep on keeping on!
I'm also very happy that I've been hanging out with Courtney! She's a great friend...always there to help, or hold your hair. hehe
I am so lucky to have Kristi, always there for me, and looking out for me. Sorry I missed your concert, but i will make it up, i won't miss another!
I am glad to have a family who's always so understanding and helpful. Even if  one of them is mad at me for busting them. I'm sorry, but I love you.

----I am thankful for all of the great people in my life. I love you all. So i guess i Do have someone to be thankful for on V-day. So thank you! I hope that I can help all of you out at least half as much as you all help me.

Now that i've gotten all thankful...I'm going to go and look up something. Then i'm going to try to sleep, but i'm too nervous about my test. Adios mis amigos.  Mucho amor.
xox Kate xox
http://kate-is-great07.livejournal.com/18774.html

Ska Is Dead = Sex........ Probably the best show I've been to in my life, at the least this year.  Cherry Bing played beautiful ska!  Then MU330...surprised me by being pretty effin cool. The Voodoo Glow Skulls were fantabulous. Then, Streetlight Manifesto blew me away. I suggest everyone sees them play live like right now! I got a bloody, swollen lip during the Cherry Bing set, i didn't mind at all though, I was so happy just to be there at a show, it's been a while. Then Kristi spent the night at my house.

SATURDAY.... I went to my meeting thingy, which was okay. I better get some balls to be less shy by July. I think i will manage it.  Then i went to work. It was the ADD party from HELL! There was like 18 six-year olds who all had ADD. It was crazy. Then Kristi and I went to Jeff's house, for a supposed movie night but we didn't watch the movie.  I fell in love with Jeff's bean bag chair which I affectionately  call "the Bean" I made someone feel awkward, haha sorry.  Then at about 2:30 we got to kristi's house and we spent the night there.

SUNDAY....Kristi and I woke up and went running. I was amazed that kristi wanted to do physical activity voluntarily. lol j/k......It was pretty good. I'm trying to get in better shape for lacrosse. Then i went to work. After work i went grocery shopping. I love grocery shopping. It's kinda relaxing to me.  Then i had to pick up my sister. She sprung me dropping off like 6 other kids on me. I feel like complete crap. I thought today was going to be a good day, last night I went to sleep so happy. And then I wake up only to find that my dog is very sick. My mom took her to the vet and he doesn't even know quite what's wrong with her. He said her blood cell counts are way off normal, her body temp is way below average, we just found out she's anemic and he said something about her being allergic to her own blood. How can you be allergic of the blood running all through your veins, everywhere in your body? I don't know what to do to help her. I've had her since I was 4 years old. But I know she's not going to make it much longer, which is what kills me. I try to keep hope, but regardless of whether she recovers or not, she is already about 4 years over the normal life expectancy for labs. I'm afraid. I can't seem to get happy now. What makes it worse, I think she knows what is happening, like she just seems to realize what's going on. That breaks my heart.

I guess the only thing to do is hope. And try to stay positive and happy, I just don't know how.

All the emotions we once felt,
Ran down the drain along with my heart.
Now long after all the fights.
Long after the tears.
After the forgotten heartaches.
You have come back into my life.
You enter as if you're welcomed.
You once had the whole me,
You were my everything.
I gave you everything.

The final goodbye,
Was difficult.
To see you happy.
Even with the tears that rolled onto my cheeks,
You ignored the way i clutched your hand, 
How I embraced that hug,
Made the last kiss last.

Thanks for the way you acted as if it was nothing.
Acting like I meant nothing.
Everything I did for you or gave you,
That was nothing.
You made me feel so loved.
So used.
So cheap.

The saddest thing of all, 
I think i still love you.
Your eyes still make me drink all of your posion.
That smile,
Make me melt the ice sheild covering my heart.
I feel that deep burning of fire in my heart.
The fire that once burned for you.

Temptations are all around me.
Their embracing me in that ugly way they do.
Contemplating what  I want from you,
What I want out of anything.
Do I want the same shit.
Its not that  I wasnt happy,
(I would be lying if I said I wasnt.)
It's just so hard to want to subject myself to the pain I'll suffer if this doesn't work out.

I love you so much,
That I'd do anything.
I just want you to love me too.
For once,
Just once.



******Written By:  Nikki Rivers ******
